doc:
Masi Oka https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Masi_Oka 0 Masayori "Masi" Oka (岡 政偉, Oka Masayori) (born December 27, 1974) is a Japanese-American actor, producer and digital effects artist. He became widely known for his role on NBC's Heroes as Hiro Nakamura and in CBS's Hawaii Five-0 as Doctor Max Bergman. Masayori_"_Masi_"_Oka ( 岡_政偉 , Oka_Masayori ) ( born December_27_,_1974 ) is a_Japanese-American_actor_,_producer_and_digital_effects_artist . He became_widely_known for his_role on NBC 's_Heroes as Hiro_Nakamura and in CBS 's_Hawaii_Five-0 as Doctor_Max_Bergman .
